title: Ticket #5776: Another HAD use for pointsToMe().
description:
Carles Acosta sent the following log fragment from the 8.5.6 pre-release, using his 8.5.5 configuration with the following changes: 

HAD.USE_SHARED_PORT = false
REPLICATION.USE_SHARED_PORT = false
PREFER_IPV4 = false

Clearly, the self-comparison code that only checks the 'host' section of the Sinful needs to be purged everywhere I can find it. 

07/01/16 10:30:07 HADStateMachine::initializeHADList my address
 '<193.109.174.65:51450?addrs=[2001-67c-1148-400--13]-1450+193.109.174.65-51450>' vs. address in the list '<[2001:67c:1148:400::13]:51450>'
07/01/16 10:30:07 Checking address with shared port ID '<[2001:67c:1148:400::13]:51450>'...
07/01/16 10:30:07 ... found myself in list: <[2001:67c:1148:400::13]:51450>
07/01/16 10:30:07 HADStateMachine::initializeHADList my address
'<193.109.174.65:51450?addrs=[2001-67c-1148-400--13]-51450+193.109.174.65-51450>' vs. address in the list '<[2001:67c:1148:400::14]:51450>'
07/01/16 10:30:07 Checking address with shared port ID '<[2001:67c:1148:400::14]:51450>'...
07/01/16 10:30:07 HADStateMachine::setReplicationDaemonSinfulStringhost names
of machine and replication daemon do not match: 193.109.174.65 vs. 2001:67c:1148:400::13
07/01/16 10:30:07 main_shutdown_graceful
check_ins:
2016-Jul-06 14:23   Check-in [48743]: (#5776) Documentation. (By Todd L Miller )
2016-Jul-06 14:15   Check-in [48742]: (#5776) Fix the other broken-if-not-Sinful address comparison in the HAD daemon. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
